item.title: Mid-Southern Bancorp, Inc. 10-K
item.description: Mid-Southern Bancorp, Inc., which is in the Savings Institution, Federally Chartered [6035] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 26 2021 had 40321 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 607 instances 1 - 502 instances 2020 - 447 instances loan - 429 instances december - 410 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
